name: Neo Knight Journey Adv
description:
Neo Knight Journey Adv!!!
On the road that leads to the acropolis, destroys all rage-­filled basilisk with glorious blade of the knight, magic of the pyromaniac wizards, raise your own skill power and lead your clan to alcazar !
feature:
- Add checkpoint after kill a boss
- New achievement and leaderboard
- Challenge your friend and player all over the world
- Compare the skill with your friend by a real time match
